message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, and I believe it's worth discussing a price of $1400000. This is a competitive offer, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1300000. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1250000. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
